original: 4.2.4 Development Timelines . It is hereby acknowledged that GSK’s strategic objective is to move one or more of the Collaboration Products into Development at the earliest opportunity. 4.2.4 Development Timelines and Prioritization:

It is acknowledged that AstraZeneca's primary strategic goal is to progress one or more of the Collaborative Projects into the Clinical Development phase as expediently as feasible. The prioritization of these studies and activities may fluctuate in response to resource availability and strategic considerations.

The 15% royalty payable on the first U.S. $3 Billion of total annual worldwide Net Sales under this Section 6.3 shall be reduced to 12% if all of the following occur:  (i) all Theravance Compounds are discontinued by the collaboration for Technical Failure; (ii) Theravance only contributes one Theravance New Compound to the collaboration within 18 months following the Effective Date; and (iii) the Collaboration Product upon which the royalty is payable contains a LABA that is one of the GSK Initially Pooled Compounds. original: 6.6 Currencies . Monetary conversion from the currency of a foreign country in which Collaboration Product is sold into US Dollars shall be calculated in accordance with either (a) the methodology referred to in GSK’s then current Corporate Finance Reporting Policy or (b) as otherwise may be mutually agreed by the Parties.  The following summarizes GSK’s current methodology applied in accordance with its current Corporate Finance Reporting System: the cumulative year-to-date Average Rates are calculated by determining the average of (i) the preceding 31st December Spot Rate plus (ii) the Closing Spot Rates of the relevant months to date using the exact figures provided by the Reuters 2000 download.  (By way of example, the Average Rate for the five months from January, 2002 to May, 2002 would be computed by taking the sum of the Spot Rates for the preceding 31st December, 2001, plus the month-end Spot Rates for the five months to May, 2002, divided by six).
ollama_generated: 6.6 Currencies . The conversion of currencies other than US Dollars for the Collaboration Product sold abroad will be calculated based on a methodology that is flexible and can be determined either (a) in accordance with the methodology outlined in GSK's latest Corporate Finance Reporting Policy, or (b) through mutual agreement between the Parties. It is important to note that the current methodology used by GSK, as described in its Corporate Finance Reporting System, involves calculating Average Rates differently. Instead of relying on the cumulative year-to-date average, we use the monthly weighted average. This is calculated by assigning equal weights to the Spot Rate on the last day of the preceding month and the Closing Spot Rates for each subsequent month, and then averaging these rates. For example, the Average Rate for the five months from January, 2002 to May, 2002 would be calculated by taking the average of the Spot Rates on the last day of December, 2001, and the monthly Spot Rates for each month from January, 2002 to May, 2002. This methodology may be adjusted or amended at GSK's discretion.

Theravance shall make reasonable efforts to facilitate GSK in identifying a mutually agreeable Third Party to exercise the rights and activities specified in this Section 14.6.3. In accordance with the above:

In this revised clause, the responsibility for finding a Third Party has shifted from GSK to Theravance, and the condition for the clause's applicability has been inverted such that the exercise of rights or activities by Theravance could potentially benefit GSK instead of causing damage.
